word:
What an exhibition was this to be reported by students, who delight to trace such things on paper to send to their distant friends and acquaintances! They were witnesses to show, not what God has accomplished, but what Satan has accomplished in the Cooranbong school. In all these things there is among Christians a practice of necromancy [witchcraft], which will 


                                    -160- 

lead away from righteousness and truth. Serious will be the consequences, for impressions are made which will be hard to efface.
